summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2706, for the improvement of North 78th Street from East Green Lake Boulevard to Meridian Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31830 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
